TextBlock.Text: AZOLLA: Here is what we currently know of the <color=orange>Eye of the Universe</color>. Some time ago, our clan detected a signal older than the universe.

SENNETTI: Escall immediately had our clan warp to the approximate location of the <color=orange>Eye</color>, but something went wrong. Rather than arriving at the <color=orange>Eye</color>, we arrived in the <color=purple>Bramble</color>, which quickly ensnared and compromised our <color=orange>Vessel</color>.

NESIA: While escape pods 1, 2, and 3 were able to launch, our pods were compromised, stranding us. We attempted to construct a makeshift warp device, but it only served to send us deeper into the <color=purple>Bramble</color>, where we have been trapped ever since.

OKALIS: While we are continuing our search for a means of escape, this set of circumstances has rendered us currently unable to reunite with our clan and continue the search for the <color=orange>Eye</color>. Unfortunately, we have become unable to detect the signal previously encountered, likely due to our compromising position.
